article_title: Mercy, Rockford health systems to merge
article_text:
JANESVILLE—Leaders of Rockford Health System said Janesville-based Mercy Health System is the perfect partner to lead the...

article_metadata.Description: Health systems in Janesville and Rockford, Illinois, will merge to form an organization with 7,500 employees, 80 facilities and more than $1 billion in annual net revenue.
article_metadata.author: Jim Leute
